docs.snippet: Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey said it was hard to watch the London club's Premier League title challenge fall away in his absence after revitalising their push for a top-four finish since returning from injury....

docs.snippet: Liverpool opened a five-point lead at the top of the Premier League by beating Norwich City 3-2 after title rivals Chelsea slipped up against Sunderland, ending manager Jose Mourinho's long unbeaten home league record....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool opened a five-point lead at the top of the Premier League by beating Norwich City 3-2 after title rivals Chelsea slipped up against Sunderland, ending manager Jose Mourinho's long unbeaten home league record.

docs.snippet: Under Óscar Tabárez, the national soccer team for Uruguay has undergone a slow revolution, finishing third at the 2010 World Cup and winning the 2011 Copa América....
docs.lead_paragraph: Under Óscar Tabárez, the national soccer team for Uruguay has undergone a slow revolution, finishing third at the 2010 World Cup and winning the 2011 Copa América.
docs.abstract: Uruguay's national soccer team has undergone a slow-burning revolution under coach Oscar Tabarez, finishing third at 2010 World Cup and winning 2011 Copa America; it is uncertain whether he will renew his contract after 2014 World Cup in Brazil, causing unease among the players and fans who revere him.

headline.main: In Uruguay, Team and Country Are Unified Behind Coach
headline.print_headline: In Uruguay, Team and Country Are Unified Behind Coach

docs.snippet: David Cohen, Comcast’s executive vice president, is the point man for moving deals like the one for Time Warner Cable past regulatory hurdles....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Cohen, Comcast’s executive vice president, is the point man for moving deals like the one for Time Warner Cable past regulatory hurdles.
docs.abstract: David Cohen, executive vice president for Comcast, oversees company's lobbying operation and sets strategies to shepherd acquisitions past antitrust questions and other regulatory concerns; company's merger with Time Warner Cable represents Cohen's latest victory.
